 2021-07442021-07-22,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of ROY POGORZELSKI of Lethbridge, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis.
